sentences.en: He fished and nailed up his catch to dry on the wall of the byre.
sentences.cn: 他去钓了鱼，并把钓来的鱼钉在牛棚的墙上晒干。

sentences.en: We discovered the floor of the byre when we excavated so effectively we had put back what was originally there.
sentences.cn: 原来别墅边上有一个牛棚，我们挖掘的时候发现了牛棚的地板，所以我们恢复了别墅原来的模样。

trans.tran_en: a farm building in which cattle are kept
